title: Russia Moves Closer to Banning Telegram App, Saying It Foments Terrorism
summary_full: News of an investigation into Pavel Durov, the app’s billionaire founder, deepened a crackdown on what remains of the free Russian internet.
summary_public: News of an investigation into Pavel Durov, the app’s billionaire founder, deepened a crackdown on what remains of the free Russian internet.

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: crackdown on what remains of the free Russian internet
